1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Aishah that:If the Prophet wanted to eat when he was sexually impure, he would wash his hands

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ قَالَ يُجْزِئُهُ غَسْلُ يَدَيْهِ
chapter.eng-name: Concerning one who says that washing the hands is sufficient
